cell.p: Watch the Orientation video.
Read Course Syllabus and Calendar.
Complete the WeBWorK Orientation Assignment by Thursday at 10 .
Make a post in the Find a Study Group! Discussion by Thursday at 10 . And then be a member of a study group of 46 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 10.1, 10.2, and 10.3 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #1 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 10.4, 10.5, and 10.6 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #2 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 10.7, 11.1, and 11.2 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #3 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 11.3, 11.4, and 11.5 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #4 by Sunday at 10 .
Work through the midterm exam review material.

Midterm Exam is on Tuesday 7/25 at 2:004:20 for CRN 33419. And on Wednesday 7/26 at 2:004:20 for CRN 31183. See if an alternative is necessary, but you need to plan for such things at least two weeks in advance.
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.

Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 12.1, 12.2, and 12.3 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #5 by Sunday at 10 .

Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 12.4 and 12.5 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #6 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 13.1 and 13.2 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #7 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 13.3 and 13.4 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #8 by Sunday at 10 .
Watch video lectures and complete related lecture outlines.
Read corresponding textbook sections.
Post completed video lecture notes.
Complete the WeBWorK Exercises for Sections 13.5, 13.6, and 13.7 by Sunday at 10 .
Complete and upload Worksheet #9 by Sunday at 10 .
Work through the midterm exam review material.

Final Exam is on Tuesday 8/29 at 2:004:20 for CRN 33419. And on Wednesday 8/30 at 2:004:20 for CRN 31183. See if an alternative is necessary, but you need to plan for such things at least two weeks in advance.
